このゲームを長くやっていますが、はっきり言います。
買わないほうがいいです。

バランスが崩壊しています。
サバイバーが有利すぎてキラー枯渇しており、キラーのマッチングはかなり速いです。
しかし、発電機の発電速度がものすごく早くてゲームになっていません。
また、サバイバー側に当たり判定があり、終盤に肉壁と呼ばれる害悪行為をされがちです。
もうキラーはやる価値ありませんし、やるとしてもトンネル必須です。

サバイバー側からよくトンネルが害悪と言われますが、サバイバー側の有利度を考えると全く害悪でも卑怯でもありません。
そもそもバランスが崩壊しているので、キラー側がどんな害悪行為をしようが脱出されます。

運営が何も考えずキラーの弱体化ばかりを行い、サバイバーを有利にしたため昔と比べ人口が大幅に減りました。
もうそろそろオワコンかと思います。

2/10 

Do yourself a favour, don't play this game. UNLESS you have a bunch of friends and just wanna chill together, not really caring about winning, balance, etc. 
It's a good game at its core, with good mechanics, a good structure, popular characters from well-known franchises, good marketing etc - everything that has helped it succeed where Evolve failed as an asymmetrical game. 

However, I feel like it's long overstayed its welcome. 
The DLCs aren't worth it. Cosmetics are overpriced. The rift (season pass) is becoming more and more of a blatant cash grab with shittier cosmetics that nobody even asked for. Seriously, who even wants to pay for a damn keychain to slap on your hook that no one can even see or bother to see in the dim lighting of the game??? In terms of cosmetics and store items alone, this is pretty much a mobile game's profit model disguised as a PC game. 

The design team for characters and support team seem to be doing okay, but they're being dragged down by the rest of BHVR. E.g. 
- Shitty balancing, game devs don't understand their own game 
Ref: youtube.com/watch?v=RQ7HT0QnUdY
Ref 2: youtube.com/watch?v=g28KozjF0AI
- Balancing is done from their own POV, and most of the devs/playtesters are not the best at their own game, which means that for higher MMR players, the balance changes rarely make any sense. 
- Hackers are rampant in spite of EAC, and there have been no significant changes or measures to deal with this - don't hold your breath. 
- Game director literally tells you to go play something else "Civilisation is a pretty good game!" 
youtube.com/watch?v=tvRMd7aQ5v4

Even looking past all of these, the community itself is one of the most toxic I've seen, mostly because players treat it like a competitive game when the game isn't designed to be played competitively at all. 

Long story short, game is bad in its current state and has little to no competition. Don't play it.
新版本玩了几次，屠夫感觉还蛮不错，多伤一拖三或者护士电涌真不错，就是单排人削的太厉害了，应该想办法遏制车队的存在，给单排玩家一个生存空间，同时也不要让屠夫特别难受
Le jeu est incroyable, je recommande aux gens qui aiment les jeux d'horreur, et qui aimerait jouer entre amis.

I've been looking for something with a bit more suspense, and though I'm late to the DBD party, I've enjoyed playing it so far and like the thrill of hunting/being hunted a lot. 

I enjoy having monsters/killers from popular horror franchises in the game (love me some Cenobite), but am kicking myself for not playing DBD when Stranger Things content was still available. Overall though, it's a solid experience and I do love me some good ol' hide-and-seek with a touch of spice. 

If I were to suggest a killer for DBD, I'd personally love John Carpenter's 'The Thing' as a killer and RJ MacReady as the accompanying survivor. Just a fantasy, but it would be fun. 

My only gripe with DBD is that I wish there were hairstyles for some of the survivors with less hair options.

Когда я только узнал об этой игре, решил, что это обычный хоррор. Этим жанром я особо не увлекался. Но всё изменилось, когда в эту игру меня позвали друзья. И в тот момент я понял, что это игра не сколько про ужасы, сколько про увлекательный геймплей, который, к сожалению, довольно редко можно увидеть в современных играх. Именно благодаря этой игре я познакомился со многими классическими фильмами ужасов, на которые ранее не падал взгляд. В игре безусловно есть некоторые негативные моменты, но они с лихвой перекрываются всем вышесказанным.
